title: Beautiful 2bd 2bth Apt! All amenities and pet friendly! $500 Special!
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Find the home of your dreams at Sofi at Topanga Canyon.
Our one, two, and three bedroom apartments for rent in Chatsworth, California, provide a luxurious home base with high ceilings, stainless-steel appliances, and spacious floor plans.
As a resident of Sofi at Topanga Canyon, you’ll have access to resort-style amenities like an outdoor pool, fitness center, and barbecue area.
Settle into upscale living designed for every day at Sofi at Topanga Canyon.
In an effort to provide the best customer experience, we are now offering virtual tours, self-guided tours, and in-person tours by appointment only.
Contact us today to schedule your personalized experience.
Two Pets MaximumCertain Breed RestrictionsPlease contact our friendly leasing team with any additional questions about our pet policy, including breed restrictions and any required deposits and fees.
To see our upscale amenities for yourself, schedule your personalized tour of Sofi at Topanga Canyon today.
Ask about our 30-Day Move-In Satisfaction Guarantee and Renter's Assurance Programs.
Stainless Steel Appliances, All Standard Appliances Included
